Body:
I am trying to learn and use ROBO4J which is purely in java. But in their blogs and videos they talk about using LEGOs for hardware.

I would like to know if this framework support is specific to LEGO or i can expect the same for other hardware as well(rasp pi).

Thanks, Vijay

column9: you can see that the robo4j-hw-* module contains support for multiple hardware platforms
column10: including Adafruit and Sparkfun on Raspberry Pi
column11:
and also for LEGO platforms as you say.

Their getting started page also runs through an example on the Raspberry Pi (specifically using Adafruit).

"
